data.title: Rentrak-comScore Merger Complete: Read New Ratings Company’s Memo
data.meta_description: Now, comScore will report in more than 75 countries
data.text:
Today we announced that Rentrak and comScore are now one.

Our merger has been completed and together we are moving forward, as one, to create the new model for a dynamic, cross-platform world. The new comScore will use massive data scale to establish new currencies for understanding consumers’ multiscreen behavior, providing a precise, innovation-led understanding of audiences, brands and consumer behavior around the world.

This is an important day for the new comScore and also for our clients. Your commitment to us has made our successes to date possible, and we know that ongoing collaboration will be the foundation of our future success. While we will continue to provide you with the same trusted services you rely on today, we are eager to build on these efforts to bring you our next generation of products, built with today’s consumer in mind.

We have heard from our clients across the industry, and the message has been very clear: measurement needs to evolve. With a spirit of innovation, determination and collaboration, our promise as the new comScore is that we will work together with you and move swiftly to advance our industry.

We will provide you with a new model of measurement for the cross-platform world; one that is not merely evolutionary, but revolutionary. It will be precise in answering your most detailed questions and unified in a way that takes the pain out of quantifying behavior across screens. Working with our partners we will extend our model to countries across the world, measuring audiences everywhere.

As our valued client, we thank you for your loyalty and partnership. We look forward to working alongside each of you as we embark on this exciting new chapter.
